title: Magic carpet

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Magic carpet is a transportation method in the Kharidian Desert. The magic carpet system is operated by Rug Merchants.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Magic carpet
Not to be confused with Rug.
A player taking a magic carpet ride.

The Magic carpet is a transportation method in the Kharidian Desert. The magic carpet system is operated by Rug Merchants.

There are two major hubs from which the carpets travel - Shantay Pass and South Pollnivneach. Carpets can travel in both directions between destinations, but other carpet destinations will only travel to one of these two hubs.

The carpets require 200 coins to use, but this falls to 100 coins after doing the Rogue Trader miniquest (desert section - blackjack or clothes). With a ring of charos (a), you can reduce the price to 75 coins. (If the ring of charos (a) is used without completing The Feud quest, the price is 100 coins.)

After completing the Hard Desert Diary, all magic carpet rides become free of charge.

Magic Carpet Destinations:
From Shantay Pass
Location Quest Required
Pollnivneach None
Bedabin Camp The Tourist Trap
Uzer The Golem
From north of Pollnivneach
Shantay Pass None
From south of Pollnivneach
Nardah None
Sophanem Icthlarin's Little Helper
Menaphos Icthlarin's Little Helper
From Menaphos
Sophanem Icthlarin's Little Helper
From Sophanem
Pollnivneach None
Menaphos Icthlarin's Little Helper

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 March 2015
(update | poll)

Carpet rides are now free if you have completed the Hard Desert Diary.

28 August 2014
(update)

Magic carpets are no longer invisible when your right hand is empty.

23 May 2013
(update | poll)

Magic carpets can now be used while you have a weapon equipped. The 'Travel' option on the merchants now has less dialogue.

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.

{{confuse|Rug}}
[[File:Magic carpet.gif|thumb|300px|A player taking a magic carpet ride.]]
The '''Magic carpet''' is a [[transportation]] method in the [[Kharidian Desert]]. The magic carpet system is operated by [[Rug Merchant]]s.

There are two major hubs from which the carpets travel - [[Shantay Pass]] and South [[Pollnivneach]]. Carpets can travel in both directions between destinations, but other carpet destinations will only travel to one of these two hubs.

The carpets require 200 [[coins]] to use, but this falls to 100 coins after doing the [[Rogue Trader]] miniquest (desert section - [[blackjack]] or clothes). With a [[ring of charos (a)]], you can reduce the price to 75 coins. (If the ring of charos (a) is used without completing [[The Feud]] quest, the price is 100 coins.)

After completing the Hard [[Desert Diary]], all magic carpet rides become free of charge.
